mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Is Our Command!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, there I was, strolling into Bank of Entitlement with my usual swagger. I waltzed up to the teller and demanded they match the exact shade of my designer shoes for their office decor-because why should I suffer through bland surroundings when I grace them with my presence, right?Naturally, the teller looked perplexed, but I didn't back down. I threw a fit that would make a toddler proud, insisting that it was a basic human right to have a bank that catered to my aesthetic preferences. And you know what? Those tellers scrambled to find a Pantone color swatch that matched my shoes perfectly. The nerve-wracking 15 minutes it took them to locate the precise shade felt like an eternity, but when they finally got it right, I strutted out of there feeling like the king of entitlement. Who knew a bank could be so fulfilling?
